response.overview: Robin Trower's 2nd album following his departure from Procol Harum. Bridge of Sighs, was lauded critically and was a commercial breakthrough. The album saw Robin push his trio's initial concept into exciting new territory. Accompanied by James Dewar on soulful vocals and bass duty and with Reg Isidore underpinning their psychedelic blues sound with masterful drumming.  50 years later, this recording has been newly mixed and remastered from the original studio sessions. Released for the 1st time on Blu-ray, the disc includes Dolby ATMOS, 5.1 and stereo album mixes.
response.title: Robin Trower Bridge of Sighs
